content: the blooming lotus square is a beautiful intricate floral overlay crochet square designed in collaboration between two friends sitting on opposite sides of the earth inas @inas craft and i begun playing the what were you thinking square game in february last year yes back in 2020 and after many hours weeks yes even moths of laughter through twists and turns of life we finished her in the autumn somethings are just that much sweeter when cooked together over time this square ended up being a bit bigger than the other what were you thinking squares from the series she measures 25 x 25 cm and is thereby approximately 5 cm bigger than the others this highly textured yet calming design makes a perfect base for such projects as pillows crossbody bags blankets and wallhangings we hope you ll have lots of fun xxx tess & inas
